mooc-section-learning-goals-title: Title of the learning goals section.
mooc-section-learning-goals-button-title: Title of the button to edit the learning goals.
mooc-section-video-button-title-edit: Title of the button to change the video.
mooc-section-script-button-title-edit: Title of the button to edit the script.
mooc-section-quiz-button-title-edit: Title of the button to edit the quiz.
mooc-section-further-reading-title: Title of the further reading section.
mooc-section-further-reading-button-titl: Title of the button to edit the further reading items.
mooc-section-units-button-title-edit: Title of the button to edit the units.
mooc-section-units-button-title-add: Title of the button to add an unit.
mooc-section-units-unit-link-video: Title of the link to the unit's video section.
mooc-section-units-unit-link-download-vi: Title of the link to download the unit's video.
mooc-section-units-unit-link-script: Title of the link to the unit's script section.
mooc-section-units-unit-link-quiz: Title of the link to the unit's quiz section.
mooc-section-learning-goals-empty-descri: Placeholder shown when the learning goals section is empty.
mooc-section-learning-goals-empty-edit-l: Text of the link to encourage viewers to define a learning goal.
mooc-section-video-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the video section is empty.
mooc-section-video-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to define the video.
mooc-section-script-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the script section is empty.
mooc-section-script-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to create the script.
mooc-section-quiz-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the quiz section is empty.
mooc-section-quiz-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to create the quiz.
mooc-section-further-reading-empty-descr: Placeholder shown when the further reading section is empty.
mooc-section-further-reading-empty-edit-: Text of the link to encourage viewers to define a further reading resource.
mooc-section-lessons: Name of the lessons section when used within a sentence.
mooc-section-lessons-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the lessons section is empty.
mooc-section-lessons-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to add lessons.
mooc-section-units-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the units section is empty.
mooc-section-units-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to add units.
mooc-button-save-edit: Label of the button that saves the edits made to a section.
mooc-button-cancel: Label of the button that cancels the current action.
mooc-button-expand-section: Label of the button that expands the section.
